Able to get secret monsters [???] from multiple cds?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Able to get secret monsters [???] from multiple cds?
By qolf on Monday, March 11, 2013 - 05:38 pm:

Now everyone might already be aware of this, but i
haven't read anything on here about it, i don't
think. But it's possible to get the secret subtype
of a monster from more than one CD. I got the
monster, Birdie [Suezo/???] from an AOL PC cleaner
disc or something of the sort i was sent in the
mail instead of the Tiger Woods Golf game that
originally gives you the monster. Has anyone else
ever had this happen? If so with what monster and
CD?

Just trying to start some interesting
conversations on here. It makes me sad that it
isn't as active anymore :(

By Lisa Shock on Monday, March 11, 2013 - 06:55 pm:

Yeah, we cracked the mystery of the discs a while back, more info in the Laboratory. For some games, Tecmo purposefully made the game read several types of disc (PSX game, PC Game, and a music CD) to make the same monster. But, some monsters turn up a lot, especially if they were designed to be found on a PC game.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, March 16, 2013 - 04:53 pm:

For some reason, this rare shows up a lot on PC discs. Problem is, no one ever gives us enough info to post in the CD list to duplicate it. So the list doesn't reflect how commonly it's found. I recall testing some PC discs for it back in the day from vague descriptions like yours, and they didn't work.

By qolf on Saturday, March 16, 2013 - 09:28 pm:

Ah i see, i'm pretty sure i still have the CD so i
could go looking for it and put up some details
about it.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, March 16, 2013 - 11:46 pm:

If you can post it here and I'll move the post to the CD list.
